name: Using unregistered brand prohibited; penalty
text: It shall be unlawful for any person to use any brand that has not been duly registered according to law.  Any person using any brand that has not been duly registered according to law shall be fined not less than $1 nor more than $200 for each animal so branded. [L 1893-4, c 39, §1; am L 1903, c 8, §2; RL 1925, §686; RL 1935, §264; RL 1945, §1073; RL 1955, §20-45; HRS ; am L 1984, c 8, §2]
